keyMappings:
unmapAll

map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map <c-v> passNextKey

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map b scrollFullPageUp
map <space> scrollFullPageDown

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map yy copyCurrentUrl

map r reload
map R reload hard
" Temporary Containers
" - turn on Alt+O
" - remap to Alt+R

map : Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map cc Vomnibar.activate
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map tt duplicateTab
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
map ; visitPreviousTab
map ]] nextTab
map [[ previousTab
" Tree Style Tab
" - Toggle "Tree Style Tab" Sidebar C-Space
" - Focus to Next Tab (expand tree) C-p
" - Focus to Prev Tab (expand tree) C-p

" map t createTab about:newtab
map <c-h> moveTabLeft
map <c-l> moveTabRight

map gt Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=tr
map gd Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=gd
map gr Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=wiktru
map ge Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=wikten
map gw Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=w

map <c-i> goForward
map <c-o> goBack
map >> goNext
map << goPrevious
map gh goToRoot
map gu goUp
map gi focusInput
map gf nextFrame
map gs toggleViewSource

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map ? showHelp

map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode swap

# ---

mapkey <c-c> <c-[>
mapkey <c-с> <c-[>

mapkey й q


mapkey Ж :
mapkey . /
mapkey т n
mapkey Т N

mapkey о j
mapkey л k
mapkey р h
mapkey д l
mapkey пп gg
mapkey П G
mapkey и b
mapkey <c-г> <c-u>
mapkey <c-в> <c-d>
mapkey <c-ш> <c-i>
mapkey <c-щ> <c-o>
searchEngines:
gd: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&hl=en#dobs=%s Google Dictionary
wiktru: https://ru.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Russian Wiktionary
wikten: https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s English Wiktionary
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
tr: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
ru: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#ru|en|%s Google Translator
ру: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#ru|en|%s Google Translator
en: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#en|ru|%s Google Translator
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
ud: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=%s UrbanDictionary
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'


# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
